hints.content: So on the number line, we start at $46$ and move **right** $\purpleD{50}$ and then $\maroonD2$ more.

This number line shows $46 + 52$:

![A number line starts at 46 with plus 50 and goes to 96. From 96 plus 2 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9be1d60ee0a678dfb9f7694194b7dc7a150bf07d)

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 46 with plus 20 and goes to 66. From 66 plus 5 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d6a8340946aeda9b589dc6e51d907ba9e90e3e28)
![A number line starts at 46 with plus 5 and goes to 51. From 51 plus 2 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c8b60c1befea06966e2a879c6f3b87031c4f5133)
